title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.21 - Consignment of tickets to agents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.21 - Consignment of tickets to agents

State Regulations

Upon instructions of the commission, banks and
depositories shall consign lottery tickets to agents and shall collect tickets
that the agents have not sold. Bank depositories shall not deliver tickets to
an agent who has failed to settle such agent's account with respect to
outstanding tickets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5001.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
